scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npx -p typescript tsc --noEmitOnError false || true
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production cd server && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' npx tsx index.ts
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
